clauses.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.
clauses.clause_text: • With research collaborators, but only under the condition that they are obligated to keep any personally identifying information confidential.

case.text: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation

clauses.title: Your account can be deleted without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text: You agree that MIT, in its sole discretion, may terminate your use of the Site or your participation in it thereof, for any reason or no reason.

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
clauses.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.
clauses.clause_text: I didn't find a more fitting quote, but they seem to use Twitter trackers on their website.

case.text: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection (Massachusetts, USA)
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for weak data regulations and poor user privacy protection. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case the reason why it shall be applied.
clauses.clause_text: You agree that any dispute arising out of or relating to these Terms or any content posted to a Site will be governed by the laws of the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, excluding its conflicts of law provisions.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
clauses.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.
clauses.clause_text: To respond to subpoenas, court orders, or other legal process, in response to a request for cooperation from law enforcement or another government agency, to investigate, prevent, or take action regarding illegal activities, suspected fraud, or to enforce our user agreement or privacy policy, or to protect our rights or the rights of others.

case.text: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text:
We may share the information we collect with third parties as follows:

  • With service providers or contractors that perform certain functions on our behalf, including processing information that you provide to us on the Site or operating the Site or portions of it.

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text: This quote isn't really precise, but by surfing through the website users may find Google cookies.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: Content is published under a free license instead of a bilateral one
clauses.description: User-generated content, such as posts or comments, is published under a free license, meaning other users can reuse it (e.g. Creative Commons license).
clauses.clause_text:
All content and projects on this Site are licensed under the
Creative Commons Attribution- ShareAlike 4.0 International
License.

case.text: Content is published under a free license instead of a bilateral one

clauses.title: You maintain ownership of your content
clauses.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.
clauses.clause_text:
MIT has no proprietary rights in the apps you create with MIT App
Inventor.

case.text: You maintain ownership of your content

clauses.title: You can delete your content from this service
clauses.description: You can ask the service to remove your content at any time, and it's deleted within a reasonable time.
clauses.clause_text:
You have the right to download your apps and
delete them from the server at any time.

case.text: You can delete your content from this service

clauses.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
clauses.description: The Third Parties accessing your personal information must keep it confidential and only use it for limited purposes.
clauses.clause_text: These service providers and contractors will be obligated to keep your information confidential.

case.text: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

clauses.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
clauses.clause_text:
You agree to defend, hold harmless
and indemnify MIT, and its subsidiaries, affiliates, officers, agents, and
employees from and against any third-party claims, actions or demands arising
out of, resulting from or in any way related to your use of the Site, including
any liability or expense arising from any and all claims, losses, damages
(actual and consequential), suits, judgments, litigation costs and attorneys’
fees, of every kind and nature.

case.text: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements (July 2020)
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: <em>These Terms were modified on July 1, 2020.

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: You are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses that may incur by downloading materials
clauses.description: Users are responsible for any harm to their computer system or loss of data they may incur through the download of materials from the service.
clauses.clause_text: Your access to or download of software, information, materials, or data through the Site or any reference sites is at your own discretion and risk and that you will be solely responsible for any damage to your property (including your computer system) or loss of data that results from the download or use of such material or data.

case.text: You are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses that may incur by downloading materials

clauses.title: Political discussions or campaining are prohibited
clauses.description: Political content in the form or pictures, discussions, or campaigning isn't allowed.
clauses.clause_text: • Political content or content related to partisan political activities

case.text: Political discussions or campaining are prohibited

clauses.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
clauses.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.
clauses.clause_text:
MIT does not warrant the Site will operate in an
uninterrupted or error-free manner

case.text: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

clauses.title: You must create a Google account to use this service
clauses.description: You must provide the service with your information in order to use it
clauses.clause_text:
In order to log in to MIT App Inventor, you need to use a Google
account.
Your use of that account is subject to Google’s Terms of
Service for accounts, and the information you provide to Google is
governed by Google’s Privacy
Policy.

case.text: You must create an account to use this service

clauses.title: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
clauses.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.
clauses.clause_text:
Prohibited Content
  • Content that defames, harasses, or threatens others

case.text: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text: THE SITE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE"

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to post any content of pornographic nature. This includes adult content, things that are sexually explicit, or obscene.
clauses.clause_text: Any inappropriate, profane, pornographic, obscene

case.text: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited

clauses.title: Instructions are provided on how to submit a copyright claim
clauses.description: If content that you own is copied or made accessible through the service in a way that constitutes an intellectual property right infringement, you can report it following the instructions given in the agreements.
clauses.clause_text:
Copyright owners who believe their material has been infringed on the Site should contact MIT’s designated copyright agent at dmca-agent@mit.edu, or at 77 Massachusetts Ave., Cambridge, MA 02138-4307 Attention: MIT DMCA Agent, W92-263A.

Notification must include:

case.text: Instructions are provided on how to submit a copyright claim

clauses.title: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes
clauses.description: The Terms may be updated without prior notice, but users will be notified of the changes at the moment they will start applying.
clauses.clause_text:
MIT reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time and will
publish notice of any such modifications online on this page for a
reasonable period of time following such modifications, and by
changing the effective date of these Terms.

case.text: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes

clauses.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text: We may log the IP address

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
